underlying_goal: Reformat a LaTeX paper to use the ICML 2026 style, fix resulting formatting issues, and commit the work.
friction_detail: Claude was unable to delete the 'icml-resources' directory as requested due to file system permissions, and had to ask the user to do it manually.
primary_success: Successfully performed a complex reformatting of a LaTeX paper from one conference style to another, and then correctly diagnosed and fixed a subtle table layout issue caused by the new two-column format.
brief_summary: Claude ported a LaTeX paper to the ICML 2026 style, including updating packages, commands, and layout. The user then pointed out a broken table, which Claude correctly diagnosed (column width and escaping issues) and fixed. The work was then committed.
